Title: Relates to the rights of grandparents with respect to visitation rights or custody of minor children
Summary: Establishes the intent of the legislature to generally defer to parental choices regarding the care, custody and control of their children; mandates that the death of a parent shall be a factor when considering a grandparent's standing to receive visitation or custody; directs that costs be payable by an unsuccessful petitioner where a contest was brought in bad faith.
LawCode: Amd ยง72, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to the rights of grandparents with respect to visitation rights or custody of minor children
